name: Webdriverio-Automation-Challenge
description: Automation Challenge project to run WebdriverIO tests with Cucumber

scripts.clean: read -p "Are you sure you want to clean the project? [y/n] " REPLY; if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then rm -R .git .github demo-app test .codeclimate.yml .travis.yml jest.json wdio.BUILD.conf.js src/features/**; fi
scripts.test: npm run test:validate && npm run test:unit && npm run test:features
scripts.test:features: npm run local-webserver & (wdio wdio.BUILD.conf.js; wdio_ret=$?; forever stopall; exit $wdio_ret)

author: Steve Henry <tcnubian@yahoo.com>
